title: Crystallization of smooth amorphous calcium phosphate microspheres to core–shell hydroxyapatite microspheres
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,25369-25377
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04078C, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Mei-li Qi, Zhaoxuan Long, Xiao-Cun Liu, Haijun Zhang, Jin Li, Shengkun Yao
Porous hydroxyapatite HA microspheres with a core–shell structure are crystallized via dissolution and re-crystallization of smooth amorphous calcium phosphate microspheres.
